Selectmap Interface

This module implements the basic access function to the Selectmap interface of the Xilinx FPGA on the RCU. More...

Detailed Description

This module implements the basic access function to the Selectmap interface of the Xilinx FPGA on the RCU.

Function Documentation

int initSmAccess ( const char *  pDeviceName  ) 

Initialize the interface.

The device will be opened and some other other internal states initialized.

Parameters:
pDeviceName,: name of the device node, if NULL: /dev/rcu/virtex as default
Returns:
neg. error code if failed
-ENOSPC : can not get the size of the interface buffers, or buffers too small
-ENOENT : can not open device

int releaseSmAccess (  ) 

Close the device and release internal data structures.

Returns:
neg. error code if failed
-ENXIO : no device open
